pages.text: $(li)The Milk Bucket is a drink, when consumed, it will immediately removes all you status effects.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted with $(l:patchouli:tools/neapolitan/milk_bottle)Milk Bottles$(/l) and an $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/bucket)Empty Bucket$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).

$(li)You can obtain Milk Bucket without crafting right clicking while you are holding an Empty Bucket in your hand and you are pointing a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/cow)Cow$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/environmental/yak)Yak$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/mooshroom)Mooshroom$(/l).$(br)$(li)This is a valious ingredient to multiple food recipes in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).
